name: Clockwork Watchman
conditionImmune: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned

trait.name: Immutable Form
text: The clockwork watchman is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
text: The clockwork watchman has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Halberd
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 10 ft., onetarget. Hit: 7 (1d10 + 2) slashing damage.

action.name: Slam
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Net Cannon
text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, range 5/15 ft., one target, size Large or smaller. Hit: the target is restrained. A mechanism within the clockwork huntsman's chest can fire a net with a 20-foot trailing cable anchored within the watchman's chest. A creature can free itself (or another creature) from the net by using its action to make a successful DC 10 Strength check or by dealing 5 slashing damage to the net at AC 10. The watchman can fire up to four nets before it must be reloaded.
